sentences.en: A landmine is a kind of weapon used in war.
sentences.cn: 地雷是一种运用于战争的武器.

sentences.en: Ability, landmine warhead ( rockets fire landmines at target ) .
China is now basically safe from landmine hazards on its own territory.
sentences.cn: 中国国内的雷患已基本清除.

sentences.en: In addition, it will cost 300 to 1000 dollars to eliminate a 30 - dollar landmine.
sentences.cn: 而且每清除一颗30美元的地雷, 需要花费300到1000美元.

sentences.en: In June 2006, Mosha lost leg when she stepped on a landmine near the Thai - Burmese border.
sentences.cn: 2006年6月, 小象摩萨踩在泰缅边境附近的地雷上,让她失去了一条腿.

sentences.en: Initially workers thought the copper vessel was a landmine.
sentences.cn: 起初，工人以为这个铜罐子是一个地雷。

sentences.en: Katyusha - Strong vs buildings, stationary units. Ability, landmine warhead ( rockets fire landmines at target ) .
sentences.cn: 喀秋莎:对付建筑物, 静态单位很强. 技能:地雷 弹头.

sentences.en: Landmine killed at least two thousand people and wounded more than five thousand others last year.
sentences.cn: 去年地雷至少杀死了2000人并且有5000多人受伤.

sentences.en: Landmine? Want to do the hip twist?
The landmine is eternally prepared to take victims.
sentences.cn: 地雷永远在那里等候牺牲者.

sentences.en: The treaty bans the use, production and trade of landmine.
sentences.cn: 那条约禁止使用, 生产,和交易雷.

sentences.en: The war ends, the landmine goes on killing.
sentences.cn: 战争结束了, 而地雷还在继续杀人.

sentences.en: This is Yang Zhiyuan undoubtedly revive ambuscade below countless landmine.
sentences.cn: 这无疑为杨致远的复兴埋伏下无数的地雷.

trans.tran_en: a bomb hidden in the ground that explodes when someone walks or drives over it
